entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who is shouting instructions to Harry. He forces Harry's head down as Stunning Spells fly towards them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being instructed by Sirius. He ducks with Sirius and then runs to grab Neville.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who has knocked Tonks off the stone steps and is running back towards the fray.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks falls from halfway up the stone steps after being hit by Bellatrix.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a person who Harry tries to grab and run with. His legs are twitching uncontrollably.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley sways across Harry's field of vision as he battles Rookwood.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is a person who is battling Kingsley.

relationships.description: Sirius forces Harry's head down as Stunning Spells fly towards them.
Bellatrix knocks Tonks off the stone steps.
Harry tries to grab Neville and run with him.
Harry tries to support Neville by putting his arm around his neck.
